label: 兵庫領
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A bureau (ryō) in charge of the military storehouses in which were kept the weapons for actual war purposes, and those used only for ceremonies. Divided into Left (Sahyō-goryō) and Right Divisions (Uhyōgoryō ).
